comments:
Build: 2002-01-09

Opened the "My Eclipse" view in the resource perspective.  Internal error, log 
attached.  

Error message: Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: org.eclipse.ui

Exception message: org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.PlatformConfiguration: method 
<init>()V not found"

Stack:
java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: 
org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.PlatformConfiguration: method <init>()V not

Created an attachment (id=221)
Log file showing error trace

In the 0115 drop I no longer get an error but adding an install view to some 
other perpective does not seem to work either (if I check the views in 
Customize... nothing is added)

I tried in 20020204 and it still happens. I can have My Eclipse view added, but 
it is empty because the exception happens in the content provider when asking
for the current configuration. The stack trace is as follows:
